mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.* ,B.* FROM tbl_schedule A JOIN tbl_calendar B ON A.CAL_NO = B.CAL_NO LEFT JOIN tbl_calendar_mem C ON B.CAL_NO = C.CAL_NO LEFT JOIN tbl_employee D ON C.EMP_NO = D.EMP_NO LEFT Join tbl_employee E ON B.MADE_EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO WHERE B.MADE_EMP_NO = #{empNo} OR C.EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY SCD_START_DAY, SCD_START_TIME
SELECT A.* ,B.* FROM tbl_schedule A JOIN tbl_calendar B ON A.CAL_NO = B.CAL_NO WHERE SCD_NO = #{scdNo}

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT A.* ,B.CAL_NAME ,B.CAL_COLOR FROM tbl_schedule A JOIN tbl_calendar B ON A.CAL_NO = B.CAL_NO LEFT JOIN tbl_calendar_mem C ON B.CAL_NO = C.CAL_NO WHERE A.SCD_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchSchedule}, '%') AND ( B.MADE_EMP_NO = #{empNo} OR C.EMP_NO = #{empNo} ) ) AS A ORDER BY A.SCD_START_DAY, A.SCD_START_TIME
SELECT A.* ,B.EMP_NAME AS madeEmpName FROM tbl_calendar A JOIN tbl_employee B ON A.MADE_EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO WHERE A.CAL_NO = #{calNo}

SELECT A.CAL_NAME ,A.CAL_COLOR ,B.CAL_NO ,B.EMP_NO AS memEmpNo ,C.EMP_NAME AS memEmpName FROM tbl_calendar A LEFT JOIN tbl_calendar_mem B ON A.CAL_NO = B.CAL_NO JOIN tbl_employee C ON B.EMP_NO = C.EMP_NO WHERE A.CAL_NO = #{calNo}

SELECT A.* ,C.EMP_NAME as comWriterEmpName FROM TBL_SCHEDULE_COMMENT A JOIN TBL_SCHEDULE B ON A.SCD_NO = B.SCD_NO JOIN TBL_EMPLOYEE C on A.COM_WRITER = C.EMP_NO WHERE A.SCD_NO = #{scdNo} ORDER BY A.COM_NO
